1 "use strict";
  2 /*jslint
  3     white: true,
  4     node: true
  5 */
  6 
  7 /**
  8  * Pretty prints javaScript using esprima and escodegen. Line endings
  9  *  will be converted to the value stored in os.EOL
 10  * @param {String} source The source code to prettify.
 11  * @param {Object} escodegenOptions Optional. Use different settings for
 12  *  escodegen.
 13  * @param {Object} esprimaOptions Optional. Use different settings for
 14  *  esprima.
 15  * @see <a href="http://esprima.org/doc/">http://esprima.org/doc/</a>
 16  * @see <a href="https://github.com/Constellation/escodegen/wiki/API">
 17  *  https://github.com/Constellation/escodegen/wiki/API</a>
 18  * @requires esprima
 19  * @requires escodegen
 20  * @requires os
 21  * @example
 22  *  var formatter = require('atropa-jsformatter');
 23  *  var out = formatter('function wobble() { return "flam"; }');
 24  *  console.log(out);
 25  */
 26 function formatJs(source, escodegenOptions, esprimaOptions) {
 27     
 28     var esprima, escodegen, os, tree;
 29     
 30     esprima = require('esprima');
 31     escodegen = require('escodegen');
 32     os = require('os');
 33     
 34     esprimaOptions = esprimaOptions || {
 35         "loc"      : false,
 36         "range"    : true,
 37         "raw"      : false,
 38         "tokens"   : true,
 39         "comment"  : true,
 40         "tolerant" : false
 41     };
 42     
 43     escodegenOptions = escodegenOptions || {
 44         "format" : {
 45             "indent" : {
 46                 "style" : "    ",
 47                 "base"  : 0,
 48                 "adjustMultilineComment" : true
 49             },
 50             "json"       : false,
 51             "renumber"   : false,
 52             "hexadecimal": false,
 53             "quotes"     : "single",
 54             "escapeless" : false,
 55             "compact"    : false,
 56             "parentheses": true,
 57             "semicolons" : true
 58         },
 59         "parse"    : null,
 60         "comment"  : true,
 61         "sourceMap": undefined
 62     };
 63     
 64     tree = esprima.parse(source, esprimaOptions);
 65     tree = escodegen.attachComments(tree, tree.comments, tree.tokens);
 66     
 67     return escodegen.generate(
 68         tree, escodegenOptions).replace(/(\r\n|\r|\n)/g, os.EOL);
 69 };
 70 
 71 
 72 module.exports = formatJs;
